missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} The door is locked. A hero can interact with a terminal to try and slice it. When all terminals are disabled, the door opens.
{-} Imperial mission tokens represent pulse cannons. At the end of each round, each one will fire upon a Rebel.
{-} A hero can interact with a pulse cannon to try to disable and discard it.
{-} The Rebels win when Shortatha is rescued.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

changeRepositionOverride.theText: Block access to the terminals and Shortatha.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
Gaarkhan lets out a soft growl as you approach the small series ol buildings. Several guards and sentry weapons are present, and the hum of machinery fills the air.

A few prisoners mill around, hauling equipment, but many are escorted to cells. You don't see any Wookiees. The one you're looking for, Shortatha, must be in a holding cell somewhere nearby.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} The door is locked. A hero can interact with a terminal to try and slice it. When all terminals are disabled, the door opens.
{-} Imperial mission tokens represent pulse cannons. At the end of each round, each one will fire upon a Rebel.
{-} A hero can interact with a pulse cannon to try to disable and discard it.
{-} The Rebels win when Shortatha is rescued.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
As you blast the restraints from Shortatha's limbs, he roars and charges the remaining stormtroopers in the base. Gaarkhan follows along, releasing other captives in the wake of his rampaging comrade.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Gaarkhan receives the "Life Debt" Reward card.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
The defenses are too thick, and you are forced to pull back. As the shuttle picks you up at the extraction point, Gaarkhan gives a low growl of sorrow; his brother's life debt remains unfulfilled.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Green Cannon Fires
globalEvents.eventText:
The green-tinted cannon powers up and discharges a blast towards {rebel}.

Roll 1 red and 1 yellow die. {rebel} suffers {H} equal to the {H} results. If {rebel} is not within line of sight of the green pulse cannon, choose the closest Rebel who is.

If Gaarkhan was attacked by the cannon, he becomes <color="red">Focused</color>.

globalEvents.name: Yellow Cannon Fires
globalEvents.eventText:
The yellow-tinted cannon powers up and discharges a blast towards {rebel}.

Roll 1 red and 1 yellow die. {rebel} suffers {H} equal to the {H} results. If {rebel} is not within line of sight of the yellow pulse cannon, choose the closest Rebel who is.

If Gaarkhan was attacked by the cannon, he becomes <color="red">Focused</color>.

globalEvents.name: Red Cannon Fires
globalEvents.eventText:
The red-tinted cannon powers up and discharges a blast towards {rebel}.

Roll 1 red and 1 yellow die. {rebel} suffers {H} equal to the {H} results. If {rebel} is not within line of sight of the red pulse cannon, choose the closest Rebel who is.

If Gaarkhan was attacked by the cannon, he becomes <color="red">Focused</color>.

eventActions.theText:
You start hitting the cannon with all your might.

Test {K}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the cannon, then discard all strain tokens from the cannon. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You rain hits upon the pulse cannon, but it is surprisingly sturdy. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the pulse cannon for each {B} result gained.

globalEvents.name: Red Cannon Smashed
globalEvents.eventText: The cannon collapses in a shower of sparks.

entityProperties.name: Cannon Red

eventActions.theText:
You can try to slice into the terminal's systems - or simply smash it to pieces.

Test {I} or {K}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens from the terminal. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You make progress, but you're not done yet. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the terminal for each {B} result gained.

globalEvents.name: Prison Guards
globalEvents.eventText:
Seeing your advancement through their fellow guards, stormtroopers in front of the main prison area charge out, setting up a heavy blaster emplacement. Behind the cell door, a chained Wookiee blinks in the sudden sunlight, then lets out a defiant roar.

{-} The Rebel mission token represents Shortatha. A hero can interact with Shortatha to rescue him.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Imperial mission tokens represent pulse cannons. At the end of each round, each one will fire upon a Rebel.
{-} A hero can interact with a pulse cannon to try to disable and discard it.
{-} The Rebel mission token represents Shortatha. A hero can interact with Shortatha to rescue him.
{-} The Rebels win when Shortatha is rescued.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Divert Power
globalEvents.eventText:
Prison officers run back and forth, shouting frantic orders to the guards.

One reaches the compound's intercom system. "Rebel troops are advancing! Divert power to the remaining pulse cannon, and stop them, you fools!"

For the rest of the mission, when the pulse cannon fires, roll 2 red dice instead of 1 red and 1 yellow die.

entityProperties.theText: The cell door is locked tight. It is controlled by the three terminals.
